description.ko: 모놀리식의 안정성과 디지털 혼돈 사이의 균형을 탐구하는 고대비 기하학적 추상화입니다.
description.en: A high-contrast geometric abstraction exploring the balance between monolithic stability and digital chaos.

prompt: A massive, brutalist obsidian monolith mid-fracture against a stark white digital void, cascading into a torrent of sharp geometric shards and vertical scanline glitches. Monochrome complexity utilizing #1A1A1A, #FFFFFF, and #808080. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass surfaces. High-contrast cinematic lighting with razor-sharp shadows. The composition emphasizes chaos within order, featuring deep textures of digital noise and metallic digital debris in a state of perpetual disintegration.
